summary: My first attempt in adding my Queer Rangers into the Skyrim world :) He is a knight just graduated from his training with ice and shock magic in major :P
descriptionHtml:
This is my 1st mod and my 1st attempt to bring the cast of my Queer Rangers of the 31st century into the Skyrim world :) and I\'m sure it is easier to use the NMM to download it to skip all the trouble.

U have to get  **Apachii skyhair for males** and  \"Apachii skyhair\" by Apachii for Bobby\'s hair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/
Bobby comes with his steel plate armor, sword and shield. However, I highly recommand u to get the shiny armor from Dopalacz\'s masterpiece :D 
SPOA Silver Knight Armor by dopalacz
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32275/
SPOA Silver Knight Shield by dopalacz and FrankFamily
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34496/

Now back to our gay knight (well, sexual orientation is meaningless in Skyrim since all marriage npcs open to both men and women) in shiny armor, Bobby mostly use shock and ice magic but I worry I gave him too many spells and perks XD So, pls send me feedback, may be I need to power down him. I also uploaded a few pics of him which are done by me.

Bobby Dolphin Knight
Code Name: Dolphin Knight
Secret Identity: Bobby Gate Hanks
Location: Dawnstar Windpeak Inn
Age: 22
Body: 1.85m/71kg/fashion model swimmer build
Zodiac Sign: Sun-Aries, Moon-Aquarius, Ascendant-Sagittarius
Personalities: humorous, loving, brave, care free, co-operative, charming
Favorite Colors: sky blue, white
Likes:
*activities: diving, rock climbing, travel, fine dining
*food: sea food
*personalities: people who are happy with themselves
Sexuality: gay (well, quite meaningless in Skyrim as everyne is open to both genders :) )
Powers:ice and shock magic
default items: steel plate armor, sword and shield. Bobby is a knight after all
Group Affiliation: Rainbow Cross
author: icyhugs
